Ok, I finished testing all the scenarios in this series and uploading 
the completed work to www.cei.net/~dphofrules/scenarios.zip .  The 
other file has been deleted.  When I start working on new scenarios, 
the file will be reappear.

Now for the trivia, I created a scenario where my archmage insists on 
summoning chain lightning right away when playing it at 'Battle' 
level.  I froze time in slaughter to keep him from summoning chain 
lightning.

Now, since the tevfifty has a scenario where the mages want to warp 
space and I have a scenario where friendly archmages like to summon 
chain-lightning, are there any requests for knowing how to make a 
certain character do a certain thing?
